mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Palmer, James Patient Age: 24. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound left knee. Location Wounded: In action at Winchester, VA. Date Wounded: 1864/09/19. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Returned to duty.
